meanings.definition: A design or figure engraved or carved into a surface.
meanings.sent1: The ancient intaglios on the stone told stories of the past.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate intaglios on the jewelry.
meanings.sent3: The intaglios on the tree trunk seemed to come alive in the moonlight.
meanings.sent4: His words were like intaglios etched into her heart.
meanings.sent5: The intaglios on the wall seemed to whisper secrets of the artist.

meanings.definition: A gem or other stone engraved with a design in intaglio.
meanings.sent1: The intaglios on the ring sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She treasured the intaglios passed down through generations.
meanings.sent3: The intaglios on the necklace seemed to dance as she moved.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like intaglios, revealing her true emotions.
meanings.sent5: The intaglios on the pendant glowed with an inner light.

meanings.definition: A printing process in which an image is incised into a surface.
meanings.sent1: The intaglios in the book were beautifully detailed.
meanings.sent2: He learned about intaglios in his art class.
meanings.sent3: The intaglios on the paper seemed to pop out at her.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like intaglios, etched vividly in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The intaglios on the print made it look three-dimensional.
